exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K x : V P : V -> Prop eps : posreal Heps : forall y : V, ball_norm x eps y -> P y y : V Hy : ball x eps y Unable to unify "ball x eps y" with "ball_norm x eps y".

original: intros x. unfold filter_le, locally, locally_norm. intros P [eps Heps]. exists eps. intros y Hy. apply Heps. apply Hy.
